----
[[include :scp-wiki:component:image-features-source |hover-enlarge=--]
|enlarge-amount=6
|speed=250
|float=false
|width=100%
|url=http://scp-sandbox-3.wdfiles.com/local--files/ananomalouswriter/SCP%205572%20Desktop%20With%20Text.jpg

|caption=SCP-5572
]]
 _
Another entry into my specialized Art Piece Wallpaper series. The original article of SCP-5572 was packed with a great story and very vivid visuals. As such, I decided to make an artwork that depicts one of the scenes. Overall the article was a blast to read. The particular scene depicted in the image is the cavalry-like charge described in the article. I experimented with depicting a large crowd and more organic smoke in the rockets which I think turned out well.

> Read the original article for the full experience: [[footnote]]Do it now.[[/footnote]]
> SCP-5572 â€” I Ain't No Skeleton's Son
> Written by: Ralliston, Trotskyeet
> Link: https://scp-wiki.wikidot.com/scp-5572

Animated Live Wallpaper [[[https://youtu.be/JH-sbO6yqSE | HERE]]]
